entry.title: WIND WARNING, Ulukhaktok
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and after midnight. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times late this evening and after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:15 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:15 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:15 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
